title: Up to ~30% performance improvements.

comments.body:
## [Current coverage][1] is `95.58%`
> Merging **#79** into **master** will increase coverage by **+0.05%** as of [`3b8b293`][3]


```diff
@@            master     #79   diff @@
======================================
  Files           14      14       
  Stmts          717     724     +7
  Branches        92      96     +4
  Methods                          
======================================
+ Hit            685     692     +7
  Partial          0       0       
  Missed          32      32       
```

> Review entire [Coverage Diff][4] as of [`3b8b293`][3]


-----
### [Uncovered Suggestions][2]

1. `+0.96%` via [...estFirstSearch.scala#175...181](https://codecov.io/github/olafurpg/scalafmt/core/src/main/scala/org/scalafmt/internal/BestFirstSearch.scala?ref=3b8b29384785c605ca801fad13f77225bca99c74#175) 
1. `+0.27%` via [...lafmt/ScalaFmt.scala#53...54](https://codecov.io/github/olafurpg/scalafmt/core/src/main/scala/org/scalafmt/ScalaFmt.scala?ref=3b8b29384785c605ca801fad13f77225bca99c74#53) 
1. `+0.27%` via [...internal/Split.scala#74...75](https://codecov.io/github/olafurpg/scalafmt/core/src/main/scala/org/scalafmt/internal/Split.scala?ref=3b8b29384785c605ca801fad13f77225bca99c74#74) 
1. *[See 7 more...][2]*

[1]: https://codecov.io/github/olafurpg/scalafmt?ref=3b8b29384785c605ca801fad13f77225bca99c74
[2]: https://codecov.io/github/olafurpg/scalafmt/features/suggestions?ref=3b8b29384785c605ca801fad13f77225bca99c74
[3]: https://codecov.io/github/olafurpg/scalafmt/commit/3b8b29384785c605ca801fad13f77225bca99c74
[4]: https://codecov.io/github/olafurpg/scalafmt/compare/ee49997d826ec5e7be26ebc048ef67e6d381d98d...3b8b29384785c605ca801fad13f77225bca99c74

> Powered by [Codecov](https://codecov.io). Updated on successful CI builds.

body:
* no optimizations zones is now Set[Token] instead of Set[Range]
* Replaced mutable.{Set,Map} with their respective builders.
* changed State.compare from tuple comparison to if/else tree of
  Integer.compare.

```
JMH
===
Benchmark                    Mode  Cnt     Score    Error  Units
BaseLinker.scalafmt          avgt   10    72.014 ±  2.236  ms/op
BaseLinker.scalariform       avgt   10    13.491 ±  0.468  ms/op
Division.scalafmt            avgt   10   127.424 ±  4.343  ms/op
Division.scalariform         avgt   10    36.947 ±  5.346  ms/op
OptimizerCore.scalafmt       avgt   10   968.754 ± 53.008  ms/op
OptimizerCore.scalariform    avgt   10   253.146 ± 84.824  ms/op
SourceMapWriter.scalariform  avgt   10     7.059 ±  0.168  ms/op

Observe that ~400ms were shaved off OptimizerCore compared to last commit.

Scala.js
========
Timed out: 23
Success: 897
Total: 920
+-------------+--------+--------------+----------+---------+---------+----------+
|          Max|     Min|           Sum|      Mean|       Q1|       Q2|        Q3|
+-------------+--------+--------------+----------+---------+---------+----------+
|10.007,766 ms|1,781 ms|359.649,734 ms|400,947 ms|31,752 ms|85,599 ms|225,574 ms|
+-------------+--------+--------------+----------+---------+---------+----------+
```

Thank you @rorygraves for the suggestions!
